title: Sentiment Analysis
description: Analyze the sentiment of your text

inputText.description: Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

categories.description: A comma-separated list of categories to analyze

systemPromptTemplate.description: String to use directly as the system prompt template
systemPromptTemplate.default: You are highly intelligent and accurate sentiment analyzer. Analyze the sentiment of the provided text. Categorize it into one of the following: {categories}. Use the provided formatting instructions. Only output the JSON.

includeDetailedResults.description: Whether to include sentiment strength and confidence scores in the output

enableAutoFixing.description: Whether to enable auto-fixing (may trigger an additional LLM call if output is broken)

batching.description: Batch processing options for rate limiting

batchSize.description: How many items to process in parallel. This is useful for rate limiting, but might impact the log output ordering.

delayBetweenBatches.description: Delay in milliseconds between batches. This is useful for rate limiting.
